Entries.Content: I was jealous of the TECH TEAMS Party tonight and wanted to be an honorary member....just for the night....just so I could attend. I would take on any challenge put in front of me. I was tasked with building a drupal site on a mac. And this is what I did. http://www.adrupalsiteonamac.com/

Entries.Content: Big thanks to Kelly, who fortunately for me was getting back to her FedEx routes. Even though not her job anymore she was instantly willing to help me prepare an FedEX of an OPDP submission to get out the door for our client. Thanks Kelly!

Comments.Comment: Any time!!! Always down for a little FEDEX blast from the past. International shipping and receiving is seared forever into my memory
